review: First time using fire tv , setup is dumb proof , the intro also helps to discover how to enjoy it better , works pretty fast and it's great deal also. I had an issue with the delivery but Amazon took quick measures and left me satisfied at a 100%!Just a note, the packaging is extremely well made and sells from the first moment
author: Omega_buyer

review: So far so good. I am an Amazon Prime member so I have had the opportunity to view shows and movies via my Kindle; now I can do the same on my big screen TV. The set up was amazingly simple and it works like a charm. There are loads of movies and shows to pick from, though I am more interested in those that are free! ;-) Still the prices are generally low enough to bear for a movie now and then.
author: nucci

review: Love the fire stick.Loads of free content and easy to navigate.No lag. Highly recommended
author: Jake Kee

review: "Cut the cable" on the bedroom TV and replaced it with this.  Couldn't be happier.  Easy 5 minute setup and I was good to go!  If I had one small complaint is that the "one button purchase" option on my Amazon account must be turned on.  Not a problem when downloading free apps, but if browsing on the pay stuff use caution.  Particularly with the iOS app.

review: Works perfectly. Great price. Love it.

review: This is great! It was a "no brainer" to set up and is so easy to use. I have it installed on the TV in the berth area of our boat.
